briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of NAFT-600 in Subjects With Tinea Pedis
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled,Multicenter, Parallel Group Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of NAFT-600 in Subjects With Tinea Pedis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of NAFT-600, applied once daily for 2 weeks, when compared to placebo for 2 weeks in the treatment of subjects with tinea pedis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Complete Cure of Interdigital Tinea Pedis
